lyrics:

i see you you see me
how pleasant this feeling
the moment you hold me
i missed you im sorry
ive given what i have
i showed you im growing
the ashes fall slowly

i will let you know
that i need to ask
before im alone

on your patient lips
to eternal bliss
im so glad to know

our laughter he knows me
were leaving were talking
youre closer its calming
